work_summary: Completed Phase 4 balance retrieval consolidation, Cycle Snapshot System Phase 1 implementation, and Build-In-Public deployment infrastructure. Managed A2A coordination appropriately, maintained focus on infrastructure priorities.
decisions_made: Unified 3 separate Robinhood balance implementations into 1 consolidated system achieving ~60% code reduction
Declined additional V2 compliance work to protect bandwidth for Infrastructure Block 5 database optimization
Implemented Cycle Snapshot System Phase 1 with 6 V2-compliant modules for swarm state management
Created comprehensive Build-In-Public deployment infrastructure with UTF-8 encoding fixes and metadata tracking
Maintained active A2A coordination with Agent-1 while managing swarm coordination requests appropriately
tradeoffs: Prioritized infrastructure depth over broad V2 compliance scope
Focused on database optimization coordination rather than accepting additional parallel work
Completed high-impact infrastructure work instead of distributing effort across multiple domains
Strategic bandwidth allocation to protect Phase 4 production deployment timeline

cold_start_handoff.current_state: Infrastructure Block 5 database optimization coordination active with Agent-1. Phase 4 production deployment preparation in progress. Build-In-Public deployment infrastructure ready for execution. Balance retrieval consolidation complete and verified.

Build-In-Public deployment scripts ready for execution
